page.title: 04GAMES AT SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: {1965 They had climbing frames and they played rounders.{ { {1985 We play French skipping. You have some elastic in a loop. Two people stretch it between them round their legs.One person jumps astride each side of the elastic. You jump inside, outside, catch the elastic with your ankles and jump astride. There are lots more like Upsies, Germansies, Jingle Jangle, Tinker Tailor, Bananasies and Blindsy. We play adventure games that Alice makes up. We play Catch, War, Cowboys, Starwars and skipping. The little ones play Dr. Who. Starwars is a film about space; Dr. Who is a science fiction television series.
